commit message: padding/margin fix for comment op highlights
padding/margin fix for comment op highlights #2
bugfix for deleting comment when viewing context

fixed an issue breaking displayed comments when refreshing discussions while viewing a single comment (in context)

This is mostly related to the fact that the previous list of items wasn't cleared properly, thus adding 'You're viewing a single comment' plus all new comments AFTER 'You've reached the end', and not below their parent comment.
